improvement_suggestions: Remove the `cape_options` entirely. The intention of the rule seems to be to simply identify instances of the observed code sequence, not to actively bypass it.  If the goal is truly bypass, more sophisticated analysis and dynamic manipulation would be required, which is beyond the scope of a simple YARA rule.
